articles.content: Leisel Jones was no stranger to skinfolds testing and weigh-ins. The Australian Olympic gold medallist remembers in stark, humiliating detail the clinical process, undertaken by male coaches in full … [+6053 chars]

articles.author: Luke Smith
articles.title: McLaren: No reason to give up the F1 fight against Ferrari for P3 - Autosport
articles.description: McLaren Formula 1 boss Andreas Seidl feels there is “no reason to give up this fight” against Ferrari for third in the constructors’ championship despite falling behind in Mexico.
articles.content:
Since scoring a 1-2 finish in the Italian Grand Prix in September, McLaren has seen its grip on third place in the standings loosen as Ferrari has fought back.
Boosted by an upgraded hybrid system o… [+1933 chars]

articles.description: Myles Garrett is set to make history in Cleveland, Mike Zimmer is not long for Minnesota and Justin Herbert will lead the Chargers to the playoffs.
